name: MOPEKS Method File
summary: Learn about .MTHD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: When you open the MOPEKS application for the first time, a window will open asking if you want to make the MTHD file associated with the MOPEKS program, click Yes.
NOTE: Other MOPEKS associated files include .MPKT, .MSCT, and .MTXT.

description: File created by MOPEKS, a freeware program that generates multiple programs run by its script to use each other to solve problems; contains a method, which is played when clicked.
